author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Sometimes when developing a given features that is known to not affect past data / MC (e.g. for Phase2), when testing it's useful to run a subset of workflows from the limited matrix, without waiting for the completion of the whole set containing workflows that are affected by the changes.
This PR proposed to break  `predefinedSet['limited']` in `runTheMatrix.py` into the sum of smaller sets separately for Run1&2, Run3, Phase2 and HeavyIons.

#### PR validation:

```
runTheMatrix.py -l run3 --show
runTheMatrix.py -l run1_run2 --show
runTheMatrix.py -l phase2 --show
runTheMatrix.py -l heavyIons --show
```

all run fine.
